MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK14 postcode area of Dollar. Engineers are progressing repairs and we still expect all power to be restored by 6AM. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.52AM on 10th December 2020.
